name: Fsk Language
author: kiro@kirosb.fr
description: Custom egg to run Fsk Language applications. Automatically builds Fsk from source.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# Fsk Optimized Installation Script

apt update
apt install -y cmake g++ make git curl

cd /tmp
echo "Downloading and building Fsk..."
git clone https://github.com/KirobotDev/fsk-lang.git fsk-build
cd fsk-build

mkdir build && cd build
cmake ..
make -j$(nproc)

# Move ONLY the necessary files to /mnt/server
echo "Deploying Fsk to server root..."
mkdir -p /mnt/server
cp fsk /mnt/server/fsk
chmod +x /mnt/server/fsk

# Copy standard library
mkdir -p /mnt/server/std
cp -r ../std/* /mnt/server/std/

# Clean up temporary build files
cd /tmp
rm -rf fsk-build

echo "Installation complete. Server directory is clean."
